content.json:
## WVD Monitoring
---

Welcome to your new workbook.  This area will display text formatted as markdown.

Select your tab to view additional dashboard items.

parameters.name: UnhealthyCriteria
parameters.label: Unhealthy Criteria
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"1m", "label":"1 minute without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"5m", "label":"5 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":true },
    { "value":"30m", "label":"30 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1h", "label":"1 hour without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"2h", "label":"2 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"8h", "label":"8 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1d", "label":"1 day without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"2d", "label":"2 days without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"7d", "label":"7 days without heartbeat", "selected":false }
]

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where State == "Connected"
| extend ClientOSType = pack("ClientOSVersion", ClientOS)
| summarize count() by ClientOS
| render piechart
content.title: Client Connection OS

content.query:
// Code to display active and inactive sessions by computer
// Adding a render piechart will automatically display the consolidated information into a piechart for visual
// Display the Current Active and Inactive sessions by linking to the latest counter values from each table. 
Perf
| where CounterName == "Active Sessions"
| extend ActiveSessions = toint(CounterValue)
| project Computer, ActiveTimeStamp=TimeGenerated, ActiveSessions 
| join kind= inner (
   Perf
   | where CounterName == "Inactive Sessions"
   | extend totalinactivesessions = toint(CounterValue)
   | extend InactiveSessions = totalinactivesessions - 2
   | project Computer, InactiveTimeStamp=TimeGenerated, InactiveSessions  
) on Computer 
| where (ActiveTimeStamp - InactiveTimeStamp) between (0min .. 15s)
| summarize arg_max(ActiveTimeStamp, *) by Computer
| extend Sessions = pack("Inactive Sessions", InactiveSessions, "Active Sessions", ActiveSessions)
| mvexpand kind=array Sessions
| project SessionType = tostring(Sessions[0]), value = toint(Sessions[1]), Computer = Computer
| render piechart
content.title: Current Session Status
Daily Connections - Rolling 7 days

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResourceDisplayName == "Windows Virtual Desktop"
| summarize arg_max(CorrelationId, *) by CorrelationId
| project ["City"]= LocationDetails.city, LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.longitude, LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.latitude
content.title: Logon Location Heatmap
Session Status History

content.query:
Perf
//| where Computer == "WVDARM-0.m365demo.com.au"
| where ObjectName == "RemoteFX Network" and InstanceName matches regex @"rdp-sxs\d{9}\s\d{0,6}" and CounterName == "Current TCP RTT" and CounterValue > 0
| summarize  avg(CounterValue) by InstanceName, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| order by InstanceName asc
| render timechart
content.title: Round Trip Latency per session

parameters.name: HostLoad
parameters.label: Host Load Capacity
parameters.description: Select the workload for the host pools - currently will set for all and just update the display below for max sessions expected

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastHeartbeat
| extend ["TimeAgo"] = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| join kind= innerunique (
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services" and
(CounterName == "Active Sessions")
| extend ActiveSessions = toint(CounterValue)
| project Computer, ActiveTimeStamp=TimeGenerated, ActiveSessions
| join kind=inner (
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services" and CounterName == "Inactive Sessions"
| extend totalinactivesessions = toint(CounterValue)
| extend InactiveSessions = totalinactivesessions -2
| project Computer, InactiveTimeStamp=TimeGenerated, InactiveSessions
) on Computer
| where (ActiveTimeStamp - InactiveTimeStamp) between (0min .. 15s)
| summarize arg_max(ActiveTimeStamp, *) by Computer
| project ActiveSessions, InactiveSessions, Computer
) on Computer
| join kind=inner(
WVDConnections
| extend Computer = SessionHostName, _ResourceId, SessionHostOSDescription, SessionHostName
| project _ResourceId, SessionHostOSDescription, SessionHostName, Computer
) on Computer
| join (
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName!="_Total"
| extend vCPU=InstanceName
| summarize dcount(vCPU) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| project Computer, dcount_vCPU
) on Computer
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| extend Packed = pack_all()
) on Computer
| where TimeGenerated == LastHeartbeat
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| make-series InternalTrend=iff(count() > 0, 1, 0) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {UnhealthyCriteria} by Computer
| extend Trend=array_slice(InternalTrend, array_length(InternalTrend) - 30, array_length(InternalTrend)-1)
| extend (s_min, s_minId, s_max, s_maxId, s_avg, s_var, s_stdev) = series_stats(Trend)
| project Computer, Trend, s_avg
) on Computer
| extend TotalUserSessions = ActiveSessions + InactiveSessions
| extend MaxSessions = dcount_vCPU * {HostLoad}
| extend Computer, SessionHostName
| order by State, s_avg asc, TimeAgo
| project ["Host Pool"]=_ResourceId, ["Computer Name"]= SessionHostName, ["vCPU Count"]=dcount_vCPU, State, ["Resource Group"] =ResourceGroup , MaxSessions, ["Total Sessions"]=TotalUserSessions, ["Active Sessions"] =ActiveSessions, ["Inactive Sessions"] =InactiveSessions, ["Host OS"]=SessionHostOSDescription, ["Log Analytics Checkin"]=strcat('ðŸ•’ ', TimeAgo), ["Heartbeat Trend"]=Trend, Computer, ["Details"]=Packed
content.title: Select one for some additional info below
CPU Top Processes utilising CPU

content.query:
WVDErrors
| where ServiceError =="false"
| summarize usercount = count(UserName) by CodeSymbolic
| project CodeSymbolic, usercount
| sort by usercount desc
| render barchart
content.title: WVD Errors - All Users (Select one to view details)

content.query:
WVDErrors
//| where UserName == "evas@microsoft.com"
| where CodeSymbolic == "{label}"
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, UserName, ActivityType, Source, Code, CodeSymbolic, Message, ServiceError, _ResourceId
| take 20
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: WVD Errors - Latest 20 results

content.query:
WVDConnections
| project-away TenantId,SourceSystem
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), StartTime = Â min(iff(State== 'Started', TimeGenerated , datetime(null) )), ConnectTime = min(iff(State== 'Connected', TimeGenerated , datetime(null) )) Â Â by CorrelationId
| join kind=leftouter (
Â Â Â Â WVDErrors
Â Â Â Â |summarize Errors=makelist(pack('Code', Code, 'CodeSymbolic', CodeSymbolic, 'Time', TimeGenerated, 'Message', Message ,'ServiceError', ServiceError, 'Source', Source)) by CorrelationId
Â Â Â Â ) on CorrelationId Â Â Â 
| join kind=leftouter (
Â Â Â WVDCheckpoints
Â Â Â | summarize Checkpoints=makelist(pack('Time', TimeGenerated, 'Name', Name, 'Parameters', Parameters, 'Source', Source)) by CorrelationId
Â Â Â | mv-apply Checkpoints on
Â Â Â Â (
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â order by todatetime(Checkpoints['Time']) asc
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â | summarize Checkpoints=makelist(Checkpoints)
Â Â Â Â )
Â Â Â ) on CorrelationId
| project-away CorrelationId1, CorrelationId2
| order by Â TimeGenerated desc

WVDConnections
| where State == "Connected"
| project CorrelationId , UserName, ResourceAlias , StartTime=TimeGenerated
| join (WVDConnections
| where State == "Completed"
| project EndTime=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId)
on CorrelationId
| project Duration = EndTime - StartTime, ResourceAlias, UserName , StartTime, EndTime
| limit 10
| sort by Duration asc
content.title: Recently Completed Logon Durations
Dummy Query for Now
